scripts.migrate:dev: npx npx ts-node ./node_modules/.bin/knex migrate:latest --knexfile src/db/database.ts --env development && cd db/seeds/dev && npx ts-node ./node_modules/.bin/knex seed:run && cd ../../
scripts.migrate:staging: npx npx ts-node ./node_modules/.bin/knex migrate:latest --knexfile src/db/database.ts --env staging && cd db/seeds/staging && npx npx ts-node ./node_modules/.bin/knex seed:run && cd ../../
scripts.migrate:prod: npx npx ts-node ./node_modules/.bin/knex migrate:latest --knexfile src/db/database.ts --env production && cd db/seeds/prod && npx npx ts-node ./node_modules/.bin/knex seed:run && cd ../../
